entries.meaning: (archaic) Penile erection or tumescence; especially, pathological erection (priapism).
examples: The emission of semen is excited by its abundance in the vesicles and by sexual instinct: it is effected by the violent tentigo which prevents the course of the urine, and, as it were, throws the way open for the semen; by a kind of spasmodic contraction of the vesiculæ seminales,  […]
